bug.description:
After starting up 10 EC2 instance, I ran ./scripts/run --gpu on each of them. On 4 of the instances, it hung for a bit and then had the following error message. <denchmark-code>docker: Error response from daemon: create nvidia_driver_375.51: Post http://%2Frun%2Fdocker%2Fplugins%2Fnvidia-docker.sock/VolumeDriver.Create: http: ContentLength=44 with Body length 0. See 'docker run --help'. </denchmark-code>
Invoking the command a second time worked.
